mapper.select: select a.* from ( select b.*, rownum rn from (select DISTINCT d.download_no , bo.board_title , bo.category_big , trunc(d.download_date) download_date , bo.member_id sal_id from board bo inner join file_download d on bo.board_no = d.group_no where d.member_id = #{member_id} order by d.download_no) b) a where rn between #{first} and #{last}
select count(*) from board bo inner join file_download d on bo.board_no = d.group_no where d.member_id = #{member_id}

select a.* from ( select c.*, rownum rn from ( select b.board_no ,b.board_title ,b.category_big ,round(sum(f.file_storage),2) file_storage ,f.upload_date from board b join file_upload f on b.board_no = f.group_no inner join members m on m.member_id=b.member_id where m.member_id = #{member_id} group by b.board_no, b.board_title, b.category_big, f.upload_date order by b.board_no ) c) a where rn between #{first} and #{last}
select count(*) from board b join file_upload f on b.board_no = f.group_no inner join members m on m.member_id=b.member_id where m.member_id = #{member_id} order by b.board_no
